name: Tag delivered Shopify orders
description:
Use this template to automatically tag delivered Shopify orders. Orders with multiple fulfillments are tagged after all of them are delivered.

Please note, that the template works with orders being fulfilled by supported [shipping carriers](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/understanding-shipping/shipping-carriers), or for local deliveries with a Shopify [Local Delivery](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-delivery-app) app.
